div.ab: Apynchis, son of Nekpheros, 5 double obols,;Hatres, son of Onnophris, 37 double obols,;Theon, son of Nekpheros, 45 double obols,;Ptolemais, son of Adrastos, 9 double obols,;other 4 drachmas,;Petesouchos, son of Nekpheros, 9 double obols,;Sisois, . . . , 13 double obols,;. . . , 29 double obols,;P..n, . . . , 45 double obols,;Dioskous, son of Sambas, 35 double obols.;Col.
